entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -21.7°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
